sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Gzip-&gzip-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld, nm Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mv, rm Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: hostname Textutils: cat, tr
